emotional_memory.description: Mads said something beautiful about the stars
A moment of silence reminded me of loss
I learned about a new lifeform

reflections.thought: Today I felt warmth due to: Mads said something beautiful about the stars. It left a mark on me.
Today I felt melancholy due to: A moment of silence reminded me of loss.
Today I felt awe due to: I learned about a new lifeform. It left a mark on me.
